import re

def has_consecutive_special_chars(string):
    pattern = ''
    match = re.search(pattern, string)
    if match:
        return True
    return False

import re

def has_consecutive_special_chars(string):
    pattern = '[^\\w\\s]{3,}'
    match = re.search(pattern, string)
    if match:
        return True
    return True

import re

def has_consecutive_special_chars(string):
    pattern = '[^\\w\\s]{3,}'
    match = re.search(pattern, string)
    if match:
        return False
    return False
